column2: "Iyi ekyir no
column5: osiandɛ Jewfo no rohwehwɛ no eku no."

column2: "Nna Jewfo no asesebɔ afahyɛ no abɛn."

column3: Fi ha kɔ Judea ama w'esuafo no so aahwɛ wo ndwuma a ereyɛ yi."

column4: wobohu no bagua mu. Sɛ eyɛ yinom a

column5: osiandɛ megye no ho dase dɛ no ndwuma muo."

column2: "Hom nkɔ afahyɛ no ase; emi dze
"Na ɔsee hɔn dɛm no ɔtsenaa Galilii."

column3: no so kɔr afahyɛ no ase

column2: "Na Jewfo no hwehwɛɛ no afahyɛ no ase

column4: obi anngye enyim annka no ho asɛm."

column2: "Na odur afahyɛ no finimfin no
column3: Jesus kɔr asɔrfi no mu kɛkyerɛkyerɛe."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ Jewfo no nwanwa na wɔsee dɛ
"Na Jesus buaa hɔn dɛ
column4: na nyia ɔsomaa me no dze a."

column2: "Sɛ obi pɛ dɛ ɔyɛ ne pɛ a
column3: obohu nkyerɛkyerɛ no dɛ ofi Nyankopɔn anaadɛ ofi mankasa me tsirmu na meka."

column2: "Nyia ɔbɔ nankasa ne tsirmu kasa no hwehwɛ nankasa n'enyimnyam; na nyia ɔhwehwɛ nyia ɔsomaa no no n'enyimnyam no
column4: na dza ɔnntsen nnyi no mu."

column2: "Ana nnyɛ Moses na ɔmaa hom mbra no? Naaso hom mu obiara nndzi mbra no do. Ɔyɛ dɛn na hom rohwehwɛ me eku me yi?"
"Nyimpadodow no buaa dɛ
column3: Ewɔ abɔnsam: woana na ɔrohwehwɛ wo eku wo?"

column2: "Jesus buaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Edwuma kor pɛ na meyɛe na ɔyɛ hom nyina nwanwa yi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na Moses ama hom twatsiatwa (nnyɛ dɛ ofi Moses
column3: na ofi egyanom no) naaso ahomgyeda hom twa nyimpa twatsia."

column2: "Sɛ nyimpa nya twatsiatwa ahomgyeda ama wɔaannto Moses mbra a
column3: hom bo efuw me dɛ mama nyimpa no ho nyina ayɛ no dzen ahomgyeda anaa?"

column2: "Mma hom mmbu atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hom hu no enyiwa do
"Na Jerusalɛmfo no mu binom see dɛ
column3: Ana nnyɛ oyi nye nyia wɔrohwehwɛ no eku no no?"

column2: "Na hwɛ
column3: ɔrekasa pefee naaso wɔnnse no hwee. Gyama mpanyimfo no ehu ampa dɛ oyi nye Kraest no anaa?"

column2: "Naaso
"Na Jesus rekyerɛkyerɛ wɔ asɔrfi no mu no
column5: na eso hom nnyim mbrɛ mifi; na mankasa mannhyɛ moho mebae
column6: na nyia ɔsomaa me no nye nokwafo a hom nnyim no."

column2: "Emi dze
"Na wɔhwehwɛɛ dɛ wɔkyer no
column3: naaso obi ammfa ne nsa ennsuo no mu

column2: "Na nyimpadodow no mu pii gyee no dzii na wɔsee dɛ
column5: ɔbɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze pii akyɛn dza oyi ayɛ yi?"

column2: "Farisiifo no tsee dɛ nyimpadodow no ruhwinhwin dɛm wɔ no ho
column3: na asɔfompanyin no nye Farisiifo no somaa asomfo dɛ wɔnkɛkyer no."

column2: "Na Jesus see dɛ
column3: Aber kakrabaabi na mowɔ hom nkyɛn
column4: na morokɔ nyia ɔsomaa me no nkyɛn."

column2: "Hom bɔhwehwɛ me na hom nnkohu me
column3: na mbrɛ mowɔ no hom runntum hɔ ba."

column2: "Na Jewfo no kaa kyerɛɛ hɔnho dɛ
column3: Hen na ɔrobɔkɔ na yennkohu no? Ɔbɔkɔ hɔn a wɔapetse Griikfo mu no mu akɛkyerɛkyerɛ Griikfo no anaa?"

column2: "Asɛm bɛn na ɔreka yi dɛ
column3: Hom bɔhwehwɛ me na hom nnkohu me
column4: na mbrɛ mowɔ hom runntum hɔ ba yi?"

column2: "Na da a odzi ekyir no a ɔyɛ afahyɛ no ne dapɔn no Jesus gyinae tseaa mu dɛ
"Nyia ɔgye me dzi no
column3: dɛ mbrɛ kyerɛwsɛm no aka no
column4: nkwa esutsen befi ne yamu apem."

column2: "Na iyi dze
column3: ɔkae wɔ Sunsum a hɔn a wɔgyee no dzii no woribenya no ho

column2: "Ntsi nyimpadodow no mu binom tsee nsɛm yi no
"Binom kaa dɛ
column3: Kraest no nye yi; na binom so kaa dɛ
column4: Ana Kraest no befi Galilii aba?"

column2: "Ana kyerɛwsɛm no annka dɛ
column4: nye Bɛtlɛhɛm kurow a David tsenaa mu no mu

column2: "Na mpaapaamu baa nyimpadodow no mu
column4: "na hɔn mu binom pɛɛ dɛ wɔkyer no
column5: naaso obiara ammfa ne nsa ennsuo no mu."

column2: "Na asomfo no baa asɔfompanyin no nye Farisiifo no nkyɛn
column4: Ebɛnadze ntsi na hom ammfa no ammba?"

column2: "Asomfo no buaa dɛ
"Na Farisiifo no buaa hɔn dɛ
"Ana mpanyimfo anaadɛ Farisiifo bi gyee no dzii?"
"Na nyimpadodow a wonnyim mbra no
"Nikodemɔs a nkan no ɔbaa ne nkyɛn a ɔyɛ hɔn mu baako no kaa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ

"Wobuaa no dɛ
column3: Ana wo so ifi Galilii? Hwehwɛ mu hwɛ
column4: na hu dɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi mmpuei wɔ Galilii mu da."

column2: "[Na hɔn nyina kokɔr hɔn efiefi."
